hero.title: Where Love Meets Art
hero.subtitle: Wedding, portrait & lifestyle photography that captures real emotions.

about.title: About Pavithra Stories
about.text: Pavithra is a passionate storyteller through her lens, capturing moments that are timeless, authentic, and full of emotion. From weddings to pre-weddings, portraits to lifestyle shoots, she believes every story deserves to be remembered beautifully. With an eye for detail and a love for natural light, Pavithra transforms ordinary moments into extraordinary memories, creating photographs that clients cherish for a lifetime. Based in India and available worldwide, she is committed to making every photoshoot a unique and joyful experience.
